description: This file contains CSS styles defining themes and layout for a food application frontend. It includes variables for light and dark themes, styles for various components like headers, links, and buttons, as well as animations.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main container for the application, centers content and applies theme styles.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Logo of the application which includes animation for spinning.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header section of the application styled to display content centrally.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styled link element in the application.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button for toggling themes between light and dark modes.
